comments.body: Over in `inventory.data.InventoryData.add_child` we weren't doing any checks to ensure the host wasn't already in the group before adding it.  Instead of spreading the logic elsewhere, this check will ensure the host isn't in the list of hosts in the group before adding again.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +114,118 @@    def add_host(self, host):
        if host in self.hosts:
            return
        self.hosts.append(host)
        host.add_group(self)
